title: the posts — where are they?
content:
why i can’t see/find my posts? is there a bug or something?

 [‹ (x) Something's Gotta Give - Linotype Didot {Bert, Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13306 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Harley Davidson logo - custom designed (similar to RR Railroad Gothic or RR Block Gothic) {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13275 "Go to next forum topic")
author: parker

comments.content:
They possibly were renamed. Read the [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091400/http:/typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq). ;-)

BTW I see “Neon & Queen” and “(G)raphic” just below, plus “Bookmaking” dangling at the bottom of the list. I checked the next pages and didn’t see any others. Which posts are you talking about?

An entire chunk of very recent posts disappeared: Between (at this writing) Last Reply times of 7 hours 7 min ago and 2 days 22 hours ago.

The FAQ isn’t even showing right now.
In the upper right hand corner of this site is a banner and it says BETA
